title: Heroine Development Plan - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Based on a Song   Based on an Anime   Female Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Honeyworks   Kousaka Mari   香坂茉里
description:
High-school freshman Suzumi Hiyori is currently LIPxLIP’s apprentice manager, and she works diligently as she supports and bickers with Aizou and Yuujirou. One day, she falls in love at first sight after someone helps her at the concert venue. And LIPxLIP finds out about it! Just as she thought she’d get teased for it, the two suddenly say they’ll transform her into a cute girl…?!

“We’ll be the ones to send Cinderella to the Prince.”>
